email.subject: Application accepted
email.plaintext_body:
Hello {{{user.first_name}}} {{{user.last_name}}}!

Your application to vote online has been accepted successfully.

You can now use {{{user.email}}} as username to login and the provided password during registration.



Regards,
email.html_body:
Hello {{{user.first_name}}} {{{user.last_name}}}!

Your application to vote online has been accepted successfully.

You can now use {{{user.email}}} as username to login and the provided password during registration.

Login Link



Regards,

sms.message: Hello {{{user.first_name}}} {{{user.last_name}}}. Your application to vote online has been accepted successfully. You can now use your phone_number as username to login and the provided password during registration. Login link: {{{vote_url}}}
